-e ---

𓋮 •cara(wan)

𓋮 𓅱 𓀁 | dragoman | Dolmetscher 𓂝 𓋮 | dragoman | √carry

𓅓 𓂋 𓋮 𓅱 𓀁 | caravan leader | mayor 𓋮 𓅱 𓀁 Mir-e-Karwan (میر کاروان) Persian 𓅓 𓂋 𓋮 𓅱 𓀁 | caravan leader | Murshid (مرشد) (mentor/guide) Muqaddam (مقدّم) Mansaf (منسف)

S24 𓋭 phrase / 𒋳 TUKU ? S25 𓋮 prau/preu(ßen) / תרגמן turgemán S26 𓋯 apron c̣insapari ( Schürze )
